Header.Title: Living On The Edge: When Life Is Out Of Balance
Header.Speaker: Dr. Don Wilson

Note.Quote: Do not fret because of evil men or be envious of those who do wrong; for like grass they will soon wither, like green plants they will soon die away. Trust in the Lord and do good; dwell in the land and enjoy safe pasture. Delight yourself in the Lord and he will give you the desires of your heart. Commit your way to the Lord; trust in him and he will do this: He will make your righteousness shine like the dawn, the justice of your cause like the noonday sun. Be still before the Lord and wait patiently for him...

ListItem.Quote: Seek first his kingdom and his rightesouness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

ListItem.Paragraph: Release things to God palms DOWN

ListItem.Quote: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways acknowledge him and he will make your paths straight.

ListItem.Quote: I waited patiently for the Lord; he turned to me and heard my cry. He lifted me out of the slimy pit, out of the mud and mire; he set my feet on a rock and gave me a firm place to stand.
